text: This film 'Hero' talks about the peace of Chinese people.
author: Jet Li

text: In every man the memory of the struggles and the heroes of the past is alive. But these memories are not incompatible with the desire for peace in the future.
author: Gustav Stresemann

text: Now people all across America are starting to believe in America again. We are coming back, back to the heights of greatness, back to America's proud role as a temple of justice and a champion of peace.
author: Theodore C. Sorensen

text: You don't make peace with friends. You make it with very unsavory enemies.
author: Yitzhak Rabin

text: A diplomatic peace is not yet the real peace. It is an essential step in the peace process leading towards a real peace.
author: Yitzhak Rabin
